languages.text: {n}Капеллан бесстрашно задирает подбородок.{/n} "Честно? Может, начиналось здесь все как очищение, но с первого же дня все больше походило на мракобесие. Да, на Футфоле всегда было трудно найти человека с чистой совестью, но разве это повод истреблять каждого, кто хоть в чем-то провинился?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Капеллан бесстрашно задирает подбородок.{/n} "Честно? Может, начиналось здесь все как очищение, но с первого же дня все больше походило на мракобесие. Да, на Футфоле всегда было трудно найти человека с чистой совестью, но разве это повод истреблять каждого, кто хоть в чем-то провинился?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Chaplain jerks his chin up defiantly.{/n} "Honestly? Perhaps this began as a cleansing, but since day one, it's looked more like a frenzy of fanaticism. Granted, people with a clear conscience have always been few and far between on Footfall. But is that a reason to exterminate everyone for the pettiest infractions?"
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан бесстрашно задирает подбородок.{/n} "Честно? Может, начиналось здесь все как очищение, но с первого же дня все больше походило на мракобесие. Да, на Футфоле всегда было трудно найти человека с чистой совестью, но разве это повод истреблять каждого, кто хоть в чем-то провинился?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Chaplain jerks his chin up defiantly.{/n} "Honestly? Perhaps this began as a cleansing, but since day one, it's admittedly been looking more like a frenzy of fanaticism. Granted, people with a clear conscience had always been few and far between on Footfall. But is that a reason to mete out death for the pettiest infractions?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

Granted, people with a clear conscience have always been few and far between on Footfall. But is that a reason to exterminate everyone for the pettiest infractions?"

languages.text: {n}牧师轻蔑地扬起了下巴。{/n}“要我说实话吗？或许这场行动的目的确实是清理罪犯，但从第一天开始，这场大清洗就像是一群疯子在肆意杀人。没错，在落脚港这个地方，几乎没多少人可以问心无愧地生活。可就因为这个，就要因为那些微不足道的违法行为，把所有人都彻底杀光吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain jerks his chin up defiantly.{/n} "Honestly? Perhaps this began as a cleansing, but since day one, it's looked more like a frenzy of fanaticism. Granted, people with a clear conscience have always been few and far between on Footfall. But is that a reason to exterminate everyone for the pettiest infractions?"

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师轻蔑地扬起了下巴。{/n}“要我说实话吗？或许这场行动的目的确实是清理罪犯，但从第一天开始，这场大清洗就像是一群疯子的狂热屠杀。没错，在落脚港这个地方，几乎没多少人可以问心无愧地生活。可就因为这个，就要因为那些微不足道的违法行为，把所有人都彻底杀光吗？”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}教戒官は反抗的に顎をしゃくりあげた。{/n}「本当ですか？これは、浄化として始まったかもしれませんが、一日目から狂信的な熱狂のように見えていた。もちろん、良い行いをしてきた人間は、フットフォールには昔から多くありません。だからと言って、些細な違反を犯した皆まで、殺す理由になるでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain jerks his chin up defiantly.{/n} "Honestly? Perhaps this began as a cleansing, but since day one, it's looked more like a frenzy of fanaticism. Granted, people with a clear conscience have always been few and far between on Footfall. But is that a reason to exterminate everyone for the pettiest infractions?"

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官は反抗的に顎をしゃくりあげた。{/n}「本当ですか？これは、浄化として始まったかもしれませんが、一日目から狂信的な熱狂のように見えていた。もちろん、良い行いをしてきた人間は、フットフォールには昔から多くありません。だからと言って、些細な違反を犯した皆まで、殺す理由になるでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Capellán levanta la barbilla, desafiante.{/n} «¿Sinceramente? Tal vez esto comenzara como una limpieza, pero desde el primer día parece más una exaltación del fanatismo. Es verdad que siempre ha escaseado en Paso la gente de conciencia tranquila, pero, ¿es esa razón para exterminar a todo el mundo por las infracciones más insignificantes?».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain jerks his chin up defiantly.{/n} "Honestly? Perhaps this began as a cleansing, but since day one, it's looked more like a frenzy of fanaticism. Granted, people with a clear conscience have always been few and far between on Footfall. But is that a reason to exterminate everyone for the pettiest infractions?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Capellán levanta la barbilla desafiantemente.{/n} «¿Sinceramente? Tal vez esto comenzara como una limpieza, pero hay que admitir que desde el primer día parece más una fiesta del fanatismo. Es verdad que siempre ha escaseado en Paso la gente de conciencia tranquila, pero, ¿es esa razón para exterminar a todo el mundo por las infracciones más insignificantes?».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Der Ordenspriester reckt trotzig das Kinn.{/n} "Ganz ehrlich? Vielleicht hat es als Läuterung begonnen, doch seit dem ersten Tag wirkt es eher wie fieberhafter Fanatismus. Gut, auf Footfall hat es natürlich schon immer herzlich wenige Leute mit einem reinen Gewissen gegeben. Aber ist das ein Grund, jeden wegen des kleinsten Vergehens auszulöschen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain jerks his chin up defiantly.{/n} "Honestly? Perhaps this began as a cleansing, but since day one, it's looked more like a frenzy of fanaticism. Granted, people with a clear conscience have always been few and far between on Footfall. But is that a reason to exterminate everyone for the pettiest infractions?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Ordenspriester reckt trotzig das Kinn.{/n} "Ganz ehrlich? Vielleicht hat es als Läuterung begonnen, doch seit dem ersten Tag wirkt es zugegebenermaßen eher wie fieberhafter Fanatismus. Gut, auf Footfall hat es natürlich schon immer herzlich wenige Leute mit einem reinen Gewissen gegeben. Aber ist das ein Grund, jeden wegen des kleinsten Vergehens auszulöschen?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Chapelain lève le menton d'un air de défi.{/n} « Honnêtement ? Ce qui devait être une simple opération de purification s'est transformé en folie furieuse de fanatique, et ce, dès le premier jour. Certes, rares sont ceux qui ont la conscience tranquille à Castel, mais ce n'est pas une raison pour exterminer tout le monde à la moindre effraction. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain jerks his chin up defiantly.{/n} "Honestly? Perhaps this began as a cleansing, but since day one, it's looked more like a frenzy of fanaticism. Granted, people with a clear conscience have always been few and far between on Footfall. But is that a reason to exterminate everyone for the pettiest infractions?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain lève le menton d'un air de défi.{/n} « Honnêtement ? Ce qui devait être une simple opération de purification s'est transformé en folie furieuse de fanatique, et ce, dès le premier jour. Certes, rares sont ceux qui ont la conscience tranquille à Castel, mais ce n'est pas une raison pour exterminer tout le monde à la moindre petite effraction. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Papaz, muhalif bir edayla başını dikleştiriyor.{/n} "Dürüst olayım mı? Belki bu, bir arındırma olarak başlamış olabilir ancak daha ilk günden delice bir fanatiklik şeklinde vücut buldu. Binliman'da vicdanı temiz insanlara çok çok nadir rastlandığını kabul ediyorum ancak bu, en basit kural ihlallerinde bile herkesi yok etmeye sebep midir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain jerks his chin up defiantly.{/n} "Honestly? Perhaps this began as a cleansing, but since day one, it's looked more like a frenzy of fanaticism. Granted, people with a clear conscience have always been few and far between on Footfall. But is that a reason to exterminate everyone for the pettiest infractions?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz, muhalif bir edayla başını dikleştiriyor.{/n} "Dürüst olayım mı? Belki bu, bir arındırma olarak başlamış olabilir ancak daha ilk günden itibaren delice bir fanatiklik şeklinde vücut buldu. Binliman'da vicdanı temiz insanlara çok çok nadir rastlandığını kabul ediyorum ancak bu, en basit kural ihlallerinde bile herkesi yok etmek için bir sebep midir?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
